\chapter*{Course website and resources for BIOE 385 fall 2022}

For the course website, please visit: \href{https://bit.ly/bioe385f22}{bit.ly/bioe385f22}

This repository contains materials for Rice University's BIOE 385: Bioinstrumentation Laboratory. These materials were originally created by Renata Ramos and adapted by James Long.
